hooks.command: file_path=$(echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path // empty' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$file_path" ]; then case "$file_path" in */shared/validators/*|*/shared/types/*|*/db/schema/*) echo '⚡ export-sync: index.ts のエクスポートを確認' >&2;; */hooks/mutations/*) echo '⚡ cache-sync: invalidateQueries を確認' >&2;; esac; fi; exit 0
